amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 28 in the Congressional Record of July 21, 1995, to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill to be used to plan or execute the Military Airport Program, a program which converts obsolete or current military airfields to civilian or joint use.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 5 - 416 (Roll no. 568).
